alert.note: Alert for City of Bristol; Lee; Russell; Scott; Washington; Wise (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 4:53PM EDT until July 29 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hawkins County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Greene County in east Tennessee... Sullivan County in east Tennessee... Northern Washington County in east Tennessee... Hancock County in east Tennessee... Northern Johnson County in east Tennessee... Northern Carter County in east Tennessee... Russell County in southwestern Virginia... The City of Bristol in southwestern Virginia... Southeastern Wise County in southwestern Virginia... Washington County in southwestern Virginia... South central Lee County in southwestern Virginia... Scott County in southwestern Virginia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 452 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lebanon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Kingsport, Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Abingdon, Rogersville, Lebanon, Mountain City, Gate City and Sneedville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 in Tennessee between mile markers 1 and 17. Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 40 and 75. Interstate 81 in Virginia between mile markers 1 and 34. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Bristol; Lee; Russell; Scott; Washington; Wise
